shipments.title: Shipments

shipments.confirmEditMessage: Are you sure you want to edit this shipment? You will be able to modify all details including batches, financial information, and logistics.

wizard.contractProductsNote: These products will be imported into the shipment. You can adjust quantities in the next steps if needed.

wizard.noBOLFound: No Bill of Lading found in document

wizard.batchesHint: Split this shipment into multiple batches for tracking

contracts.splitExceedsOriginal: Total split quantity exceeds original quantity

contracts.consigneeHint: Leave blank if consignee is the same as buyer
contracts.shipmentDateHint: If not specified, defaults to 30 days from contract creation date. This can be extracted from the proforma invoice.

contracts.sellingPriceHint: This is the price you are selling to the customer (not applicable for internal branches)

contracts.pricePerMTEquivalent: Equivalent price per Metric Ton - standardized for CFO analysis
contracts.pricePerMTStandardized: Price per MT - Standardized for CFO Analysis
contracts.pricePerMTDescription: No matter what pricing method you use (per LB, per Bag, per Container, etc.), the system automatically calculates the equivalent price per Metric Ton (MT). This ensures all contracts are comparable and accurate for financial analysis.
contracts.hasFinalBeneficiary: Payment goes to a different beneficiary
contracts.finalBeneficiaryDescription: Use this section when payment should ultimately go to a different entity (e.g., factoring company, parent company, LC issuing bank, or assignment of proceeds).

contracts.addDocumentHint: Click "Add Document" to specify required documentation
